title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Doubled Salvage Speeds for Scrapping Stolen Rides
content:
Stealing high-value vehicles in Salvage Yard Robberies is a lucrative hustle, especially when Salvage Speeds are doubled through May 29. Consult the Planning Wall and use the computer in your Salvage Yard to select from the targets below.

This Week’s Salvage Yard Robbery Targets: Pegassi Zentorno (Super) | Gallivanter Baller ST-D (SUV) | Canis Seminole Frontier (SUV).

Salvage Speeds are also doubled on vehicles scrapped with your Salvage Yard’s Tow Truck Service.
